services
Class LCDInfo

java.lang.Object
  services.LCDInfo

public class LCDInfo
extends java.lang.Object

Prints Information to the LCD display of the NXT. This includes Odometer x, y, theta; a debug value, and the next point in the Route of Navigation. It is a modified version of the code supplied in Lab 4

Method Detail

timedOut

public void timedOut()
Main update loop. Updates the Odometer values, debug value, and next Point in the route in Navigation value on the LCD screen. The screen is primarily used for debugging purposes.

x, y are in mm. Theta is in degrees

This method still needs work as it sometimes causes errors. Was not used for the final demo but is still useful so it is left here.
